alert.note: Alert for Ohio; Switzerland (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 3:02PM EDT until June 06 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM EDT FOR OHIO...SWITZERLAND...CARROLL...SOUTHERN BOONE...NORTHERN GRANT... NORTHWESTERN OWEN AND GALLATIN COUNTIES... At 301 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Vevay, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Carrollton, Williamstown, Rising Sun, Crittenden, Dry Ridge, Vevay, Warsaw, Florence, Kentucky Speedway, French, Glencoe, Fairview, Ghent, Sanders, Sparta, Patriot, Worthville, Prestonville, Aberdeen and Ryle. This includes the following Interstates... I-71 in Kentucky between mile markers 43 and 75. I-75 in Kentucky between mile markers 158 and 166. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
